function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased use of public green spaces during lockdown","Impact":"Potential for overcrowding and increased risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Implement capacity limits and hygiene measures in public green spaces","Technologies":"IoT sensors for monitoring occupancy and contactless sanitation systems","People":"General public accessing green spaces during lockdown","Owner":"City authorities and park management"},{"Description":"Unemployment due to COVID-19-related furlough","Impact":"Economic instability and potential impact on mental health","Mitigation":"Financial support, job placement programs, and mental health resources for affected individuals","Technologies":"Online job platforms, mental health apps, and economic assistance programs","People":"Individuals affected by COVID-19-related furlough","Owner":"Government and non-profit organizations"},{"Description":"Changes in daily schedules and work-life balance","Impact":"Disruption of routine and potential increase in stress levels","Mitigation":"Flexible work arrangements and mental health support services","Technologies":"Remote work tools and telemedicine platforms","People":"Workers and individuals impacted by changes in daily schedules","Owner":"Employers and healthcare providers"}]}
